p: Worthy of note, replacing the amido group in compound 7c and 7e with the ureido moiety to afford 13a and 13 b greatly enhanced the cytotoxic activity in both cell lines (37.04 and 8.33 µM vs 18.21 and 5.70 µM, respectively, in MCF-7) and (43.27 and 11.80 µM vs 3.22 and 10.88 µM, respectively, in T-47D) ( Table 1).
